meanings: [명사] conviction, confidence, assurance, [동사] be sure, be certain, be convinced, be assured, be[feel] confident (that)

vlive.korean: 그러니까 확신을 들 수 있게 하는 능력이라고 해야 되나? Should I say that I'm confident about myself? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 🐶 & ㄱ- 라디오
vlive.english: Should I say that I'm confident about myself?

전문가의 확신! Assurance from a expert! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 가두리횟집에 어서오세요! [가두리횟집] EP01
[확신] 돼지 저금통! [So sure] Piggy bank! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5

examples.korean: her sureness that she had done the right thing 발음듣기 자신이 옳은 일을 했다는 그녀의 확신 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: her sureness that she had done the right thing 발음

examples.korean: The jury were unconvinced that he was innocent. 발음듣기 배심원들은 그가 무죄라는 것을 확신하지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The jury were unconvinced that he was innocent. 발음

examples.korean: The strength of his argument convinced the waverers. 발음듣기 그의 주장에 담긴 힘이 망설이는 사람들에게 확신을 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The strength of his argument convinced the waverers. 발음

examples.korean: She swears by meditation as a way of relieving stress. 발음듣기 그녀는 스트레스를 없애는 방법으로 명상의 효능을 확신한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She swears by meditation as a way of relieving stress. 발음

examples.korean: I’m definite about this. 발음듣기 난 이것에 대해 확신해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
